text: Ian Watkins may refer to: * Ian Watkins (Lostprophets singer) (born 1977), convicted sex offender and former lead singer of Welsh rock band Lostprophets * Ian Watkins (rugby player) (born 1963), Wales international rugby player * Ian "H" Watkins (born 1976), Welsh performer, member of pop group Steps == See also == * Ian Watkin (1940–2016), New Zealand actor known for the films Braindead and Sleeping Dogs
title: Ian Watkins
